<com2:ClaimedAmount>${DataSource#ClaimedAmount}</com2:ClaimedAmount> <!--Optional:--> <com2:ClaimedCurrencyCode>${DataSource#ClaimedCurrencyCode}</com2:ClaimedCurrencyCode> <!--Optional:--> more repetitions:--> <com2:InvoiceLine> <!--Optional:--> <com2:ItemReference>${DataSource#Item Reference}</com2:ItemReference> <!--Optional:--> <com2:BupaBenefitID>${DataSource#Benefit Code}</com2:BupaBenefitID> <!--Optional:--> <com2:TreatmentFromDate>${DataSource#TreatmentFromDate}</com2:TreatmentFromDate> <!--Optional:--> <com2:TreatmentToDate>${DataSource#TreatmentToDate}</com2:TreatmentToDate> <!--Optional:--> <com2:NumberOfIncidents>${DataSource#NumberOfIncidents}</com2:NumberOfIncidents> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <com2:Copay>${DataSource#Copay}</com2:Copay> <!--Optional:--> <com2:CoInsurance>${DataSource#CoInsurance}</com2:CoInsurance> <!--Optional:--> <com2:PrimaryProcedure> <!--Optional:--> <com4:Code>${DataSource#Code}</com4:Code> <!--Optional:--> <com4:Description>${DataSource#Description}</com4:Description> <!--Optional:--> <com4:Standard>${DataSource#Standard}</com4:Standard> </com1:Invoices> </com:Claim> </com:SubmitClaimRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
